analysis.description:
QuantorPreSale.withdraw (/unique_contracts/0xa42b1bdc7ee1083122d63c445f67c4d6b5892c32.sol#529-531) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(beneficiary,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_contracts/0xa42b1bdc7ee1083122d63c445f67c4d6b5892c32.sol#530)

QuantorPreSale.doPurchase (/unique_contracts/0xa42b1bdc7ee1083122d63c445f67c4d6b5892c32.sol#572-578) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0xa42b1bdc7ee1083122d63c445f67c4d6b5892c32.sol)

QuantorPreSale.refund.refund (local variable @ /unique_contracts/0xa42b1bdc7ee1083122d63c445f67c4d6b5892c32.sol#526) shadows:
	- QuantorPreSale.refund (function @ /unique_contracts/0xa42b1bdc7ee1083122d63c445f67c4d6b5892c32.sol#521-529)
